bill.title: Department of Wildlife, Fisheries and Parks; require policies and practices to be consistent with the Public Trust Doctrine.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 49-7-1.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That Policies, Rules And Regulations Adopted By Or Practices Observed By The Commission On Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks And The Department Of Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks Shall Be Consistent With The Public Trust Doctrine; To Amend Section 49-1-43.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Policies, Rules And Regulations Adopted By Or Practices Observed By The Department Of Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks Shall Not Abridge A Conservation Officers' Access To Private Property In The State; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Wildlife, Fisheries and Parks
